hero.title: Usernames Strategy
hero.subtitle: The Degen Engine on TON
hero.description: A unique project combining token trading with premium username acquisition and deflationary mechanics through buyback and burn.

about.title: About the Project
about.description: Usernames Strategy is an innovative project on the TON blockchain that combines token trading with the premium Telegram username market. Our token features a 10% commission on both buy and sell transactions, with 80% of this commission dedicated to purchasing valuable usernames on platforms like Fragment and GetGems.
about.tokenInfo: The purchased usernames are listed with a 25% markup. When a username is sold, the entire proceeds are used to buy back tokens from the market, which are then burned, reducing the total supply and creating value for token holders.

step1.title: 10% Commission
step1.description: Every buy and sell transaction incurs a 10% commission

step2.title: 80% to Username Purchase
step2.description: 80% of the commission is used to buy premium usernames on Fragment and GetGems

step3.title: 25% Markup Sale
step3.description: Purchased usernames are listed with a 25% markup

step4.title: Buyback & Burn
step4.description: When a username is sold, all proceeds are used to buy back and burn tokens, reducing supply

commission.title: Transaction Commission
commission.description: Applied to both buy and sell transactions

buyback.title: Buyback Mechanism
buyback.description: 100% of username sale proceeds are used for token buyback and burn, creating deflationary pressure

markup.title: Username Markup
markup.description: All purchased usernames are listed with a 25% markup

feature1.title: Deflationary Model
feature1.description: Continuous token burn reduces supply over time

feature4.title: TON Blockchain
feature4.description: Built on the fast and efficient TON network
